data.description:
Let's Drive to BUMP
1. Seize the steering wheel.
2. Rev up your Bumpy.
3. BUMP!

Welcome to BumpyR, a casual social VR game where your meta avatar drives a bumper car! Though it is a car game, all you have to do is BUMP, not drive!

BUMP, CRASH, and THROW with up to 6 players!

changelog.change_log:
🎄 Winter Holiday Season is Coming!
🎁  Free holiday gift, New bumpy!
☃️  Roll Snowballs with your car and create Snowman!
🧊  Added physics system for icy road slip mechanic.

🖱️ ColorRush Ready Button design changed and added onboarding system
🔢  Join Code Panel on bumpy dashboard has been removed

🖼️ User Photos and a Discord sign-up Button were added
🔒 Changed some logic related to Analytics System

🖼️ User Photos and a Discord sign-up Button were added
🔒 Changed some logic related to Analytics System

📈 Resolved FPS Drop Issue
🕹️ Resolved ColorRush Mode Bugs including winer's podium
🛜 Resolved Server Connection error
🎃 SPOOKY HALLOWEEN in Bumpy Island! 🍬 BE CAUTIOUS - never toss water balloons into the Cauldron! 🎈 Improved the Sync of Balloon Movements

🎃 SPOOKY HALLOWEEN in Bumpy Island!
🍬 BE CAUTIOUS - never toss water balloons into the Cauldron!
🎈 Improved the Sync of Balloon Movements

🏰 [MAIN] Bumpy Island! Now we combined with Lobby and Color Rush into one
🎈 [NEW] Grab Balloons and attach them to Bumpy!
🚩 [NEW] Occupy BumpyR Landmarks for 8 seconds to have your name written down
🗑️ [NEW] The high-bouncing Trampoline!
🔏 Private Join and Host Match functions have been removed
🔐 Changed some logic related to Analytics System.

💣 [New] Lobby Bot, Bomby! When it collides with or hits a water balloon, it throws a Bomb
🖼️ Changed some assets on Lobby Notice Board

💦  [Fix] Resolved WaterBalloon visual sync issue upon explosion.
🗣️  [Fix] Stabilize the server to fix Voice Chat Audio Interruptions.
🎙️ User Name Tag displays mic and background color for mute and conversation status.
🔈 Voice Panel Button now shows a speaker icon for muting
🔊 [Fix] Resolved one of causes of not being able to hear other's voices in Voice Chat
🔊  [Fix] Resolved one of causes of not being able to hear other's voices in Voice Chat

🏆  [Fix] Trophy now spawn properly after completing the achievement.
🔊  [Fix] Voice Panel Button fixed. You can now mute other users' voices, regardless of ColorRush play count.

🏆 [New] Score Target now includes a Leaderboard!
🔔 [New] Notice board added to lobby center for announcements
⚽ [New] A small wooden sign added next to the soccer ball spawn location "Kick it, Share it"

🤖 [Fix] Bots now spawn consistently, regardless of ColorRush play count.
⚽ Soccer Ball Control Upgraded with better y-axis handling
